title: FOX Trail Trust invests $500,000 USD in Trail Network and Increasing Diversity across our sport
content:
FOX Factory has announced the launch of Trail Trust, a charitable arm of the company, with an initial $500,000 USD already invested across three key areas; Responsible Recreation, Trail Building and Maintenance, and Expanding Opportunities to increase diversity across mountain biking and power sports. The Grow Cycling Foundation and the Bicycle Industry Employers Association are

The post FOX Trail Trust invests $500,000 USD in Trail Network and Increasing Diversity across our sport appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
